original_text: And it came to pass the third day after that I was delivered, that this woman was delivered also: and we were together; there was no stranger with us in the house, save we two in the house.
korean_text: 내가 해산한 지 사흘 만에 이 여자도 해산하고 우리가 함께 있었고 우리 둘 외에는 집에 다른 사람이 없었나이다

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass the third day after that I was delivered
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 해산한 지 사흘째 되는 날에

sentences.original_text: that this woman was delivered also
there was no stranger with us in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 집에는 우리와 함께 다른 사람이 없었고

sentences.original_text: save we two in the house
